--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> i dunno, it'd have to be a pretty mega mage. i remember like one 
> fireball killing my big bad soldier

I am trying to figure out how to beat that scenario.  I added a super 
strong NPC slime and equipped him with invulnverability, invisibility, 
flight, and magic.  The game is acting wierd with that slime, though.

Why slime?  I can always create more help.  I'm almost through with 
"The Slime King".  When I get that one finished, I am skipping over to 
"Master Slime".  Word to the wise: Archmages and clerics are the key 
to beating "The Slime King" legimately.  Of course, if your character 
can out run an attack, you have a prayer of beating it.
